This is Jeremy and Vivian's blog post for CSC_5IG01_TP-HCI for mixed reality.

## Accessing the website
The URL to the website is: https://jeremy-afk.github.io/

## Run locally
1. Install Ruby from https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/ and add it to system PATH
2. Run the following commands:
```shell
gem install bundler
bundle install
bundle exec jekyll serve
```
3. Access locally at [http://localhost:4000]
